Standard.Name: Jack of all Traits - Test Item

English.Text: It is the master of expeditions, the eloquent, the strong and the mighty, they who is never lost, the savior of bodies, souls and things, the predator, the friend of man and animal, the puppetmaster, scourge of the sea, explorer of depths, the joker, the tomb raider, the cosmopolitan, the Jack of all traits.
